actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the tariff schedules of the United States with respect to the entry of horses.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to repeal the customs duty on the importation of horses, and to repeal the exception for race horses exported from and returned to the United States which permits duty-free entry of such horses.

titles.title: A bill to amend the tariff schedules of the United States with respect to the entry of horses.
